long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Wikipedia search extension

Features:
* Right click highlighted text to open it's corresponding Wikipedia page
* Search text and view results from by clicking the extensions button

Being actively updated

Fully open source: https://github.com/AbhiPrasad/Wiki-Viewer
